name: @adobe/reactor-turbine
description: Launch rule engine which processes rules on client websites and delegates logic to extensions.

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.dist.config.js && webpack --config webpack.dist.config.js --compress && webpack --config webpack.lib.config.js
scripts.ci-job: xvfb-run npm test -- --ci --browser firefox chrome ie9sg ie10sg ie11sg edgesg ios android safarisg && npm run lint
